p: Acetylcholinesterase (AChE) activity was assayed by using Ellman’s reagent, DTNB [ 14] at 412 nm. The reaction mixture composed of 10 µL enzyme sample with 180 µL Ellman’s reagent was diluted with 10 µL dH 2O in the presence of 20 µL Acetylthiocholine (20 mM) as substrate. The enzyme activity was measured in U/mg of extract.
